title: "Apple Open-sources Apple Silicon-Optimized Machine Learning Framework MLX"
excerpt: "Apple's MLX combines familiar APIs, composable function transformations, and lazy computation to create a machine learning framework inspired by NumPy and PyTorch that is optimized for Apple Silicon."
